I Am Max The

I specialize in Frontend Development, UI/UX and Web Animations

View My Work

I Specialize In

Designing beautiful and innovative frontend experiences for websites by leveraging UX/UI principles and complex web-animations.

User Stories

"Just because you can doesn't mean you should." I know firsthand that polished design doesn't necessarily mean immediate adoption, which is why I meticulously figure out what your end users need so I can design with that in mind.
